column4: Outbound Richmond Rd at New Circle Rd
column5: All outbound lanes are shutdown in the intersection, and access to Richmond Rd from the exit ramp is partially blocked.

column3: Traffic Alert for W Main St in Richmond/Madison Co:
column4: The roadway is closed between Tates Creek Ave and Pin Oak Dr until noon due to a downed power line as a result of an earlier collision.

column3: Traffic Alert for W Main St in Richmond/Madison Co:
column4: Richmond Police are asking motorists to avoid this area.
